title: Team 83 Wraps Up Shoot With A Party, Tumbbad To Be Screened In Theatres And More From Ent
text:
Team 83 Wraps Up Shoot With A Party, Tumbbad To Be Screened In Theatres And More From Ent

Team 83 Wraps Up Shoot With A Party, Tumbbad To Be Screened In Theatres And More From Ent

Ranveer Singh was joined by Deepika Padukone at the wrap up party of 83. Director Kabir Khan, producer Sajid Nadiadwala, actors Saqib Saleem, Adinath Kothare, Ammy Virk, Sahil Khattar and others were also present. The party was a blockbuster event and every member of the team indeed have a blast.

The film is clocking its first anniversary and to make the day special, the movie is returning to the big screen on 12th October for a special screening. The screening will be attended by film’s cast crew and people from the industry.

Apart from this, the celebrations by North Bombay Sarbojanin Durga Puja Samiti in the city also turned out to be grand as scores of celebrities thronged puja pandal to seek blessing from the deity. Megastar Amitabh Bachchan along with wife Jaya was spotted seeking blessings from goddess Durga at the North Bombay Sarbojanin Durga Puja Samiti in the city.

Life of actors surely isn't as easy as it looks and if you're Priyanka Chopra, the challenges of striking work-life balance just gets doubly difficult. Priyanka Chopra Jonas doesn't have a bucket list but the actor harbours certain personal ambitions, some of which she couldn't make time for in the past few years.

Almost everyone is familiar with Martin Scorsese's recent remarks about 'Marvel' movies. The ace filmmaker has been under fire for comparing the superhero films to "theme parks", saying that they don't capture the true essence of cinema.

The party was a blockbuster event and every member of the team indeed have a blast.
